name: Introduction to Film Studies
description: A course introducing students to the larger field of Film Studies, covering topics such as history, film theory, and analysis.

name: Introduction to Cinematography
description: A course introducing students to the basics of cinematography, covering topics such as camera operation, lighting, and shot composition.

name: Intermediate Cinematography
description: An intermediate course building upon the basics of cinematography, covering topics such as advanced camera operation, lighting, and shot composition.

name: Advanced Cinematography
description: An advanced course building upon the basics of cinematography, covering topics such as advanced camera operation, lighting, and shot composition.
